heading: Help Us Improve Mass.gov

title.value: Did you find what you were looking for on this webpage?

queryAffirmative.value: If you have any suggestions for the website, please let us know.

queryNegative.value: How can we improve the page?

helpTip.textBefore: Please do not include personal or contact information.
helpTip.textTrigger: You will not get a response
helpTip.helpText: The feedback will only be used for improving the website. If you need assistance, please contact the Department of xxxxx.

negativeTextarea.name: negative-textarea
negativeTextarea.errorMsg: Please let us know how we can improve this page.

alertMsg: Please remove any contact information or personal data from your feedback.
warnMsg: If you need assistance, please contact the Department of xxxxx.

success.before: Thank you for your website feedback! We will use this information to improve this page.
success.after: If you would like to continue helping us improve Mass.gov, join our user panel to test new features for the site.
